required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy, Safety, and Tolerability of BMS-986089 in Ambulatory Boys With Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Study to Assess the Efficacy, Safety, and Tolerability of BMS-986089 in Ambulatory Boys With Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multi-center, randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled study to assess the efficacy, safety and tolerability of two different weekly doses of BMS-986089 in ambulatory boys with Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy (DMD).

study_design_info.masking: Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in the 4 stair climb velocity in BMS-986089 treated participants.
Change from baseline in the 4 stair climb velocity in placebo treated participants.

arm_group.description: Take BMS-986089 subcutaneously on specified days over a 48 week blinded period
Take BMS-986089 subcutaneously on specified days over a 48 week blinded period
Placebo solution taken subcutaneously on specified days over a 48 week blinded period

intervention.description: Take BMS-986089 subcutaneously on specified days over a 48 week blinded period
Take placebo subcutaneously on specified days over a 48 week blinded period

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosed with DMD by a blood test
- Able to walk without assistance
- Able to walk up 4 stairs in 8 seconds or less
- Weigh at least 15 kg (33 lbs)
- Taking corticosteroids for DMD
Exclusion Criteria:
- Any behavior or mental issue that will affect the ability to complete the required study procedures
- Previously or currently taking medications like androgens or human growth hormone
- Use of a ventilator during the day
- Unable to have blood samples collected or receive an injection under the skin
Other protocol defined Inclusion/Exclusion Criteria could apply.

overall_contact.last_name: Recruiting sites have contact information. Please contact the sites directly. If there is no contact information, please email:

overall_contact_backup.last_name: First line of the email MUST contain NCT# and Site #.
